basics.name: Filipe Amaral
basics.label: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with nearly a decade of experience building SaaS platforms in healthcare, fintech, and insurance. I deliver end-to-end product features—from GraphQL APIs and compliance-driven systems to modern React frontends and high-performance data pipelines. I've built care plan modules, prior authorization workflows, real-time pricing engines with multi-vendor integrations, and wealth management platforms. I focus on scalable architecture, regulatory compliance, and shipping reliable systems.

work.name: Advis
work.summary: Building a full-stack wealth management platform
highlights: Building a full-stack wealth management platform using NestJS, Next.js, and TypeScript in a Turborepo monorepo
Architected type-safe API client infrastructure with OpenAPI auto-generation and TanStack Query integration
Established CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, unified linting configs, and developer tooling across the monorepo
Integrated with financial data providers (BlackDiamond, Wealthbox, Dottie) for portfolio and client management

work.name: Surton / RxPartner
work.summary: Built pharmaceutical pricing platform with multi-vendor integrations
highlights: Built FastAPI backend for pharmaceutical pricing platform, integrating multiple claims processor vendors (Optum, RxLogic, Cervey, MedOne, Buzz) for real-time drug price comparison
Implemented DynamoDB caching layer with client-specific API key caching and TTL-based invalidation for high-throughput price lookups
Built transaction tracking system with detailed logging for pricing accuracy analytics and vendor performance monitoring
Managed AWS infrastructure (Terraform) including EventBridge triggers, SQS queues, and multi-vendor credential management

work.name: DrChrono
work.summary: Led healthcare interoperability and compliance initiatives for EHR platform
highlights: Led ONC HTI-1 and USCDI v3 certification compliance, implementing provenance tracking and persistent ID versioning for 15+ clinical resource types
Built Care Plan module end-to-end: designed GraphQL schema, implemented React frontend with drawers/modals, integrated care team management with audit logging
Developed SMART on FHIR integration platform with management dashboard, JWT authentication, and patient data access for third-party healthcare applications
Implemented annual MIPS/eCQM quality measure updates (2022-2025) and QRDA exports for Cypress certification validation
Optimized bulk C-CDA export system—resolved race conditions, added performance improvements, and implemented upper limits for large healthcare practices
Built asynchronous C-CDA export API and contributed to React Calendar rebuild migrating from Angular

work.name: Tomorrow Health
work.summary: Built prior authorization system for home health equipment ordering platform
highlights: Built Prior Authorization Request system end-to-end: GraphQL backend (Python/Django) and React frontend with tables, drawers, and timeline components
Implemented PA cover sheet generation mutation, Title XIX (Medicaid) form integration, and fax submission workflow
Extended insurer data model with state-specific prior authorization configurations

work.name: Rise Financial
work.summary: Achieved PCI compliance for financial services platform
highlights: Restructured backend architecture in Django and integrated with Very Good Security to secure credit card data
Achieved PCI compliance and enhanced system scalability

work.name: BriteCore
work.summary: Modernized insurance platform serving 50+ insurance companies
highlights: Replaced legacy insurance system with modular components using Python, Django, Flask, and VueJS on AWS
Developed serverless authentication service for 50+ insurance companies using AWS Lambda and Cognito
Supported clients by proposing features, resolving bugs, and improving system reliability

work.name: localhost.company
highlights: Maintained and supported applications built in Angular 1.5 and AngularJS
Ensured stability and functionality for ongoing client projects

education.institution: Universidade Federal de São João del-Rei

projects.name: keyboard-sounds
projects.description: Mechanical keyboard sounds extension for VSCode with 17+ stars
highlights: Built a VSCode extension that plays mechanical keyboard sounds while typing
Published on VSCode Marketplace with community adoption

projects.name: ccdakit
projects.description: Python library for generating HL7 C-CDA clinical documents
highlights: Open-source library for programmatic generation of C-CDA documents
Supports healthcare interoperability standards (HL7, CDA)

projects.name: NinjaTraderIndicators
projects.description: Collection of custom trading indicators for NinjaTrader 8 with 7+ stars
highlights: Custom technical analysis indicators for algorithmic trading
Used in personal trading system
